s a s i l l ə v ɔ̃ t s ɔ̃ k v ɑ̃ t a n ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ k k ɔ̃ n m a ʁ s m i l s ɛ t s ɑ̃ k a t ʁ v ɔ̃ d i s ɛ t
ʁ y d i ʁ s ɔ̃ n e ʁ a d ø s ɔ̃ s ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ k ɑ̃ t ɔ ʁ i n j i ɑ̃ θ ɪ ɛː j ʁ ɛː j k

l e m a ʁ b ɑ̃ t j e n y t i l i n t e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ ʁ e ɡ y l j ɛ ʁ m ɑ̃ y n m a s b ɔ ʁ l a v y s t m ɑ̃ d e b j ɛ s d ə b w a
t ʁ ɛ n ʁ y v ɔ t ʁ w a t ɛ t n w a ʁ d i n n œ t t ʁ w a s ɑ̃ n e ɡ l ə t ɔ̃
a l ɔ ʁ i v i n l ə t a ʁ e t ɛ t e k i b e d y n l ɑ̃ t i j d ə t ʁ ɛ s n ɛ l d ə s ɔ̃ k j ɛ m ɔ ʁ d ʁ

œ̃ l i v ʁ

i l a e t e a k t œ ʁ d ɑ̃ k ɛ l k ə t i l m
l a ʁ i v e ɛ t ɔ v ɔ ʁ s i t y e a m ɔ n a k a
a m a t a ʁ v a d ɑ̃ l e n i l s a m a a ʁ ɔ ʁ i l ɔ̃ s t i t y t œ ʁ s ə s ɔ v j ɔ̃ d ə s ɔ̃ ɑ̃ t ɑ̃ s
s ə t i b d ə d i s k ɔ ʁ ʁ a b ɔ ʁ t e ɛ b a k ɔ m w ɔ̃ n ɔ b v ɛ k t i t k ə l ə d i s k ɔ ʁ d i ʁ ɛ k t
t l a n a ɡ ɑ̃ a d ɔ b t d ɑ̃ s e t ʁ a v a n y n a b ʁ ɔ m ʁ e v i n j ɔ n i s t a l i s t w a ʁ d e n a m e ʁ ɔ̃ d j ɔ̃
i l ɛ d ɔ t e d ə s ɑ̃ t ɛ t m a k y n b a ʁ l ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ n y n l ɑ̃ ɡ d i t e ʁ ɑ̃ t
t ɔ̃ d e b a ʁ m a ə v ɛ j ɑ̃ ɡ ʁ ɔ̃ b ɔ m e i l b ʁ e n ɑ̃ t l a t ɔ ʁ m d œ̃ m ɑ̃ d a l a
ɛ l ɛ k ɛ l k ə t w a d e b a s e b a ʁ l i m a v i n a s j ɔ̃ d ə t ɔ m e n i n a
n y ʁ ɛ s θ ɛ t ɪ k d ɛ ʁ k ɔ̃ s y m v n ɛ l m a t t
ɛ l s e t ɑ̃ t a v ɔ ʁ d y i s y ʁ e k ɔ̃ b ʁ ɑ̃ d ø n ɔ n d ə b ɔ̃ n e d ə ɡ l a s j e
s ɛ t b ʁ y i j ɑ̃ t e e l ɔ k ɑ̃ t ʁ ə k ɔ n ɛ s ɑ̃ s d ɑ̃ ʁ i k a t ʁ d y a v ɛ ʁ t i ʁ l e m a l v ɛ j ɑ̃
t ɔ t t w a l ə ɡ ɔ v ɛ ʁ n ə m ɑ̃ n a b ʁ ɔ v b a l ə ʁ a b ɔ ʁ
d ɑ̃ s ɛ t k ɔ̃ t i ɡ y ʁ a s j ɔ̃ l ə k ʁ ɔ m ɛ d e k ʁ i y n t ʁ a v ɛ k t w a ʁ k a ʁ d j ɔ i d
v ə s y i t ʁ a t ɛ b l b ɔ ʁ ʁ ɔ̃ b ʁ l ə v ɔ ɡ d ə l ɔ n œ ʁ
i l ɛ n ɔ t a m ɑ̃ e v ɔ k e d ɑ̃ l ə y ɛ n ɑ̃ n i
l ɔ̃ v ɑ̃ s j ɔ̃ d ə l a t ʁ a d i s j ɔ̃ s ə t ɔ k a l i n s ɔ v ɑ̃ s y ʁ d e l j ø d ə m e m w a ʁ
i l a e t e m ɑ̃ b ʁ d y b a ʁ t i b ʁ ɔ ɡ ʁ ɛ s i s t k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ v a t œ ʁ d ə l a n ɔ v ɛ l e k ɔ s
l e n a l m ɑ̃ n ɑ̃ v a i ʁ l a ʁ e v j ɔ̃ a v ɑ̃ k ə l e b l ɔ k n ə b y ʁ t ɛ t ʁ y t i l i n e
l ə m ɔ n y m ɑ̃ ʁ ə b ʁ e n ɑ̃ t a t i t d ə l a v i l ɛ l a k a n b a
s ɔ̃ n a k t i v i t e t ɑ̃ t ɑ̃ n ɛ k s b a n i s j ɔ̃ k ɑ̃ k ɔ l ɔ k n e a k t i v i t e b e d a ɡ ɔ v i k n ɛ t ɔ̃ t ɑ̃ s
b a ʁ d ɔ s i b ʁ ɔ t ɛ s t a a v ɛ k l e b ʁ i t a n i k k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ n ɑ̃ s ɛ t ʁ y m œ ʁ
t ʁ ɛ b ø s ɔ̃ t ɑ̃ k ɔ ʁ ɑ̃ n e t a d ə v ɔ l e

l ə a e t e i n a ɡ y ʁ e l ə m y n e i s t ɔ ʁ i k a l t a ʁ ɔ m ə a ɔ̃ s t a l e a a ʁ n
a l y i s ɛ ʁ ɑ̃ l a m ɔ̃
i l n i a a k œ̃ l i v ʁ s y ʁ l a t a b l

l ə k ɔ̃ b j ɔ̃ s ɔ m n ɔ
a t ɔ t a l s ə s ɔ̃ t ʁ ɛ n s e l ɛ k s j ɔ̃ k i ɔ̃ s k ʁ i v s ɛ t k ɔ̃ b e t i s j ɔ̃ a l œ ʁ b a l m a ʁ ɛ s
t ɔ t s e m ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ s ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ s t ʁ y i t s y ʁ l a m ɛ m t ɔ ʁ n y ʁ e y t i l i n l ə m ɛ m ɛ ʁ
s ə t ʁ a ɡ m ɑ̃ b ɔ v ɑ̃ ɛ t ʁ s w a l e t ʁ a v s w a l e t ɑ̃ b a m ə n y ʁ d ə l ɔ̃
l ə n ɔ̃ b ʁ d ə m ɔ d ɛ l k a ʁ a k t e ʁ i n l a b ʁ ɔ t ɔ̃ d œ ʁ d ə l a l i ɲ
m ə m ɔ̃ d ə v a l b ʁ ɔ t ɔ̃ d n a t ɔ n ɛ ʁ
e t y n a ʁ j ɔ̃ t ɛ t a m ə v a l e ʁ j ɔ̃ d i a m ɛ t ʁ

i l t y t y t i l i n e d ɑ̃ l e t ʁ a v ɛ ʁ s d ə m ə m ɔ̃ d ə t ɛ ʁ e d a t ʁ k ɔ̃ s t ʁ y k s j ɔ̃ v e n e ʁ a l
l a v ɔ k s ɐ k a d œ m i ɔ t ʁ d e n a t ə l j e n e d e n e v e n m ɑ̃ d e d y k a s j ɔ̃ s i v i k e b ɔ l i t i k
l e v w a t y ʁ n a s ɑ̃ b l e l ɔ k a l m ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ k ɔ m ɛ ʁ s j a l i n e s ɔ l a m a ʁ k t j a s t ɛ ʁ
k ɔ m s ɔ v ɑ̃ y n t ɔ ʁ t ɔ b a n i s j ɔ̃ ɛ ɡ n i s t b a ʁ m i l e b ɔ b y l a s j ɔ̃ n a l ɑ̃ t ɔ ʁ k ɔ̃ t ʁ s ə b ʁ ɔ v ɛ
e v a l ɔ̃ ɡ ɔ ʁ j a e m i k a ɛ l b ə ɲ a ɔ b t j ɛ n t ɑ̃ s y i t l e ʁ a l d e b a ʁ ɑ̃ d ə d ɔ ʁ a
i l ɛ l ə b ɛ ʁ d ɛ m a n y ɛ l d a l n ɔ̃

l e t ʁ ɛ ʁ k a l v i n i t a ʁ d t a a ʁ i v e

a l ɔ b a n e d ə s t ɛː j n ʌ d œ ʁ m
l ə v ɔ l œ ʁ d ø m ɛ m i l y i s ɑ̃ s w a s ɑ̃ t t ʁ ɛ n
d ɑ̃ s ə ʁ ɔ m ɑ̃ ɔ̃ ʁ ə t ʁ ɔ v d e t ʁ ɛ t ʁ ɛ n ɔ t ɔ̃ b ɛ s k d ɑ̃ l e k ʁ i t y ʁ

v y s k a s a m ɔ ʁ i l t ɑ̃ t d a m e l j ɔ ʁ e l a s i t y a s j ɔ̃ b ɔ l i t i k d ə l a w ɔ l əʊ n i
l ɔ ʁ d ʁ d y v ɔ ʁ a b ɛ l l e k ɛ s t j ɔ̃ n a ɡ ɔ v ɛ ʁ n ə m ɑ̃
t ʁ w a n ɑ̃ b l y t a ʁ ɛ l s y i y n t ɔ ʁ m a s j ɔ̃ ɑ̃ v y d ə d ə v n i ʁ ɑ̃ s ɛ n j ɑ̃ t
a b ʁ ɛ l a ɡ ɛ ʁ s ɔ̃ n ɑ̃ s ɛ n j ə m ɑ̃ t ɔ m b l y n j œ ʁ m i l j e d e l ɛ v d ɑ̃ l e m i l j ø k a t ɔ l i k k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ v a t œ ʁ

l a b ʁ ɛ s k ʁ i b s j ɔ̃ d ə t ʁ ɛ t m ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ b t ɔ m a t i k b ɔ ʁ a ɛ t ʁ t ɛ t

t y ʁ s ɑ̃ a l h a k ɛ t a t i l j e a l a ʁ m e s i ʁ j ɛ n l i b ʁ
n ə s ɔ̃ d ɔ̃ k b a k ɔ̃ b ʁ i l e n a t s e l ɛ b ʁ
l ɔ̃ s y ʁ ɛ k s j ɔ̃ ɛ ʁ a b i d m ɑ̃ m a t e l e k ɔ̃ v y ʁ e d i s b ɛ ʁ s e m ɛ l a d y m ɛ s d ə b ɛ ʁ i ʁ ɛ s t ɔ̃ t ʁ ɔ v a b l
s ə s ɔ̃ d e m ɔ̃ t a n j ʁ y s n i b ʁ i d
s ɛ l y n d e n e s ɑ̃ s d ə l ɑ̃ s j ɛ n t i l a n ɔ t i ɔ̃ d j ɛ n
s ɛ t ɔ̃ s t ʁ y m ɑ̃ ɛ b ʁ ɔ̃ s i b a l m ɑ̃ y t i l i n e b ɔ ʁ l e t y d d y ʁ ɛ j ɔ n m ɑ̃ t ɔ s i l d y b i ɡ b ɑ̃ ɡ
s ə d ɛ ʁ n j e m i ɑ̃ m y n i k t ɔ l e k a ʁ t ɔː n n d y s t y d j a v y s k a s a t ɛ ʁ m ə t y ʁ
v ə s y i s ɛ n i d ə l a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ ʁ e d a k s j ɔ n ɛ l n y m e ʁ a s i s ɑ̃ k a t ʁ v ɔ̃ œ̃ d y ɡ ɔ v ɛ ʁ n ə m ɑ̃
s ɛ t m i s j ɔ̃ d ə k ɔ̃ s ɛ j b ʁ ɑ̃ b l y n j œ ʁ t ɔ ʁ m n ɑ̃ b ʁ a t i k
l e k ɔ l ɔ n ɛ t d y b ɔ ʁ t a j s ɔ̃ d e t ʁ y i t
d œ̃ s k ɔ̃ b s ɑ̃ t i l a n e s ɛ s i t e d e t a b l i ʁ œ̃ n a b i t a l ɔ l ɔ̃ b ɔ v ɛ t a d m ɛ t ʁ d e b a s j ɑ̃
ɛ ʁ j ə d ɛ n d ə v j ɔ̃ a d e b y d y l ə l j ø d ə ʁ e n i d ɑ̃ s d e b ʁ ɔ̃ s n e v ɛ k d ɛ k s t a t
s ɛ t ɔ v ʁ a v ɛ ʁ e a l i n e b a ʁ œ̃ s j ɑ̃ t i t i k a s y v ɛ d y n d ʁ ɔ ɡ
a b ɑ̃ d ɔ n e d ə t ɔ s d ɔ̃ s ɔ̃ m a ʁ i b i b i t i t i m əʊ h a m ɪ d v i a l ɔ ʁ i n ɔ l e
m ɛ l e k l i m e d y b ɔ l a ʁ ɔ i d s ɑ̃ b l t a n ɔ̃ s e œ̃ n a v n i ʁ t ɔ v ɔ ʁ d ʁ a m a t i k
l ə k l œ b a s y ʁ ʁ a s ɔ̃ m ɔ̃ t j ɔ̃ ɑ̃ t ɔ̃ d ɛ ɡ n ɛ ʁ s i s
t ɔ t t w a n i l n ə k ʁ w a b a k ə l ə l i b e ʁ a l i s m s w a ɛ ɡ n ɑ̃ d ə t ɔ ʁ ə b ʁ ɔ m
i l d e s i d d ə k ɔ̃ s a k ʁ e t ɔ t s e ʁ ə m ɛ ʁ m v ɛ ʁ l a ʁ s i n e t i k
m ɛ n i l n ə k ɔ n ɛ ʁ j ɔ̃ n a m e t j e d ə l a t ɛ ʁ m e ɑ̃ m ɛ n l e ɡ a t
i l k ʁ e e ɡ a l m ɑ̃ d e s k y l t y ʁ b ɔ ʁ l e n a t a m a t d ə t ʁ ɑ̃ s w a v y n ɔ d
l a b ɔ l s ə v ɔ a n ɛ ʁ ɔ b i k a b i t a l d y k e n j a
ɛ l t ɔ ʁ m l a s ɔ t a m i j m ɔ n ɔ t i b i k d e t ɔ d i l i n e

i l ɛ k ɔ̃ t ʁ a l e b a n i t i t a œ̃ d j y ʁ e t i k a l i s y d ə l a k ɔ ʁ s
d i ʁ y m a b a d ə v ɑ̃ d a ʁ m n e ʁ a k a t ʁ k a t ʁ s ɑ̃ b a ʁ s ə l ɔ n ɛ t
l y n i t e y ʁ b ɛ n d ə s ɔ̃ dv œː ʁ v œ s i ɛ t œ̃ b a l y ʁ b ɔ̃ d ə l ɛ ʁ y ʁ b ɛ n d ə n i m
l a b ɔ b y l a s j ɔ̃ t ɔ t a l d ə s a v y ʁ i d i k s j ɔ̃ ɛ d ə a b i t ɑ̃
l i b ɛ ʁ m ɛ t a v w a t ɔ̃ s k i d ə ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ e œ̃ n a t ʁ d i ʁ i v ɑ̃ k ɔ m y n i s t m ɛ n d y k s j y a m ɑ̃ ɡ e
ɑ̃ s y i t ɔ̃ b a ʁ l d e ɑ̃ b l w a t ʁ ɑ̃

a b ʁ ɛ s a l i b e ʁ a s j ɔ̃ i l v a a b ɔ ʁ t y ɡ a l
ʁ y l y s j ɔ̃ ɡ i j ɔ k a t ʁ v ɔ̃ t ʁ ɛ n m i l y i s ɑ̃ n e b i n ɛ s y ʁ s ɛ n

ɛ l s ə ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ d ɑ̃ l a b e n ɔ̃ s y l d a n a
b ɛ ʁ v e b a ʁ t i d ø n j ɛ m k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ v s ɛ t b a n i s j ɔ̃ e t ɛ ʁ m i n d ɛ ʁ j ɛ ʁ l ə v ɔ̃ k œ ʁ a l ɔ̃ b ʁ ɔ s t
d ɑ̃ n y n d e m a ʁ m d ə v y l ɡ a ʁ i n a s j ɔ̃ s j ɑ̃ t i t i k ɛː j m i m ɔ̃ n œ ʁ a b a ʁ ɛ ʁ e ɡ y l j ɛ ʁ m ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ l e m e d j a
i l n a v ɛ v a m ɛ v y b a ʁ ɛ j b ɑ̃ k a ʁ t
b ɔ ʁ k w a k ə v ɔ l a l ɛ s e k ɔ ʁ i ʁ k ɔ m s a t ɔ t n y
l e k a t ɔ l i k n e t ɑ̃ s i b ø n ɔ̃ b ʁ ø v a k v ɔ l ɛ d a b ɔ ʁ l e n a b y i j e d e n ɑ̃ ɡ l i k ɑ̃
m ɔ ʁ n ɛ e d ə l a k ʁ w a d i n ɛ ʁ t ɑ̃ s ɑ̃ b l a l a s ɔ̃ s i l v ɛ s t ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ b a n i d ə l a k ɔ m e d j ɛ n
l ɑ̃ t ʁ ə b ʁ ə n œ ʁ b ʁ ɔ̃ s i b a l d ə l a t a m i j b ɔ n i s ə b ʁ e n ɔ m b a ʁ θ ɛː j l œ m i
d v a m ɛ l ɔ b t j ɔ̃ l a s ɔ̃ t y ʁ a b ʁ ɛ n a ʁ ɛ d ə l a ʁ b i t ʁ a t ʁ w a n j ɛ m ʁ a w n d

y i ʁ y d ə l ɑ̃ b ɛ ʁ v a
ɛ l ʁ ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ t ʁ l e ʁ y s a ʁ a n ɔ̃ d y t ʁ e b j e ɛ d m ɔ̃ b ʁ i œ ʁ b ʁ e n i d ɑ̃ e d ɔ a ʁ ɛ ʁ j a e d y m a ʁ m i k s

ʁ ə k ɔ̃ v ɛ ʁ t i d ɑ̃ l ə k əʊ tm ɪ ŋ i l a t ʁ a v a j e ɑ̃ t l ɔ ʁ i d ɑ̃ n a l a b a m a b y i n a t ɛ k s a s
k w a t ɔ ʁ n ʁ y v ɑ̃ t ʁ ɛ v n e ʁ a t ʁ w a k a t ʁ s ɑ̃ n ɪ n j ɔː ʁ œ
l a v n i ʁ v ɔ l a v e ɡ a m e
s ɔ̃ n e l v a v d i s b a ʁ ɛ t a b ʁ ɛ s a m ɔ ʁ

ɔ̃ s i l ə m a m a v l j e a d ə m ɑ̃ d s ɔ̃ d i k a l d ə a s d ə s a l ɛ ʁ ɛ t a t ɛ b l i

l a d e k ɔ ʁ a s j ɔ̃ ɔ̃ t e ʁ j œ ʁ ɛ b a n e s y ʁ d e t ɔ ʁ m v e ɔ m e t ʁ i k n ɑ̃ v ɛ ʁ a l y m i n j ɔ m e k ʁ a m

m ɔ̃ b ɛ ʁ ʁ ə b ʁ i ɛ l ɑ̃ s ə t ə n ɑ̃ s y b l i ɑ̃ t ɛ j e b i t j e d ə m ɔ̃ v ə n a ʁ e b l y l a t ɔ ʁ s

s ɛ t a l b ɔ m k ɔ̃ b ʁ ɑ̃ d e t i t ʁ b y b l i e b ʁ e s e d a m ɑ̃ s y ʁ d e m i k s t a b

a b ɔ l ɔ ɲ l e b ʁ ɔ b ʁ i e t e d e b ɑ̃ t i v ɔ ɡ l i a t y ʁ s a k a v e n e l ə b a l ɛ b ɑ̃ t i v ɔ ɡ l i a d e t ʁ y i
b l y n i l t ɑ̃ t ɛ d ə s y ʁ v ɛ j e s e n a ʁ j ɛ ʁ b l y n i l s ə b ɛ ʁ s y a d ɛ t ɛ t ʁ s y i v i

l ɛ k s b l i k a s j ɔ̃ d y t ɛ k ə l y n i v ɛ ʁ b yː ɛ t ʁ ɔ m ɔ v ɛ n e i n ɔ t ʁ ɔ b e t ɛ b a ʁ k ɔ̃ t ʁ ɔ̃ k ɔ n y
d e k i t d a n a l i n m e t a b ɔ l ɔ m i k b l y s ɔ̃ b l v w a ʁ a t a m a t i n e s ɔ̃ t ɑ̃ v w a d ə d e v l ɔ b m ɑ̃
s ɛ t b e ʁ y d y m a t a t ʁ ɔ̃ b ɛ t s ɔ̃ k ɑ̃ t t ʁ w a m i l s ɑ̃ m ɛ j ɛ n
s ɛ l a ʁ a s n ɔ ʁ v e v j ɛ n k i d ɔ n l e k a ʁ k a s n a b l y a ʁ ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ a l a b a t a v

s ɛ t b l a s d ə v ɛ t ɛ t ʁ s ə m i s i ʁ k y l ɛ ʁ

ɔ ɑ̃ n ə s j ɔ̃ n ɔ
l e ʁ a m œ ʁ s ɔ̃ d i s b a n e n ɑ̃ l i n j ʁ a m ɑ̃ a l t ɛ ʁ n a t i v m ɑ̃ d œ̃ k a t e d ə l a b i ʁ ɔ ɡ
i l e m n a b ʁ y s k ə m ɑ̃ s a t i j d ɑ̃ l ə v a ʁ d ɔ̃ d e t y i l ə ʁ i

l a t ʁ ɑ̃ s ɑ̃ t ʁ d ɑ̃ l a b ʁ ə m j ɛ ʁ ɡ ɛ ʁ m ɔ̃ d j a l ɔ b a k ɔ d ə v i l a v w a m ɔ ʁ y ʁ

l e n ɔ t i s j e l e ʁ ə t j ɛ n l e s y b l i s ə v ɛ t t a l œ ʁ v ə n ɔ
l a t a m l y i d i d ɑ̃ t ʁ e m ɛ d ɛ t ʁ d i s k ʁ ɛ
e v ɔ n a ɡ ʁ a v e l a s i t y a s j ɔ̃ ɑ̃ d ø m i l k w a t ɔ ʁ n
œ̃ ɔ b l y n j œ ʁ n ɑ̃ t ʁ ə t j ɔ̃ b ʁ ɔ b a n t y n ɔ̃ t ɛ ʁ v j ɔ d œ̃ n a t œ ʁ m ə n e b a ʁ œ̃ s b e s j a l i s t
s ɛ t y n ɛ s b ɛ s m ɔ n ɔ t i b i k l a s œ l d y v ɑ̃ ʁ l ɔ t w a k t i n j a

l e ɡ ʁ ɔ̃ m a l ɡ ʁ e l œ ʁ b ə t i t t a j b ø v t ɔ ʁ n i ʁ y n b ɔ n t a ʁ i n
b a v a ʁ ɛ t ʁ ɔ̃ t a l j e a v ɛ k l a b ʁ ɔ v ɔ̃ s a t ɡ a n d ə k ɔ n a ʁ
i l b ʁ e v w a j ɛ k i l n ə b ɔ ʁ ɛ t a v w a ʁ ɑ̃ n ɛ l a k y n k ɔ̃ t j ɑ̃ s d ɑ̃ l a s y i t

s a k a b i t a l s ə s i t y a m ɑ̃ b w
t y a ʁ ɛ n ɔ̃ d ə ʁ ɛ s t e ɡ a ʁ s ɔ̃

i l e t ɛ l ə b ɛ ʁ d ə l ɔ ʁ ɡ a n i s t ʁ ɔ ɛ n ɛ l a ʁ ɑ̃ d ɛ s m a n y ʁ
l ə b a t ɑ̃
m ɛ n ɛ l v i ʁ ɛ l m ə s ɑ̃ b l b ɛ ʁ d y

l a ʁ y t ʁ a v ɛ ʁ s l a b l a s v a k t ʁ ɔ m l a ʁ y m a ʁ k a d ɛ e l a ʁ y k a ʁ b a
i s i k ɔ m ɑ̃ s b ɔ ʁ l ə v e n e ʁ a l d ɔ n a d j ø y n k a ʁ j ɛ ʁ t ɔ t n ɔ v ɛ l
ʁ y ɑ̃ ʁ i d y v ɛ ʁ n w a n a n y m e ʁ a k ɔ̃ n
i l ɑ̃ s ɛ ɲ a l e k ɔ l a k i b a d ə s t ʁ a n b ɔ ʁ e a l a l j ɑ̃ s i s ʁ a e l i t y n i v ɛ ʁ s ɛ l
d ə d y ʁ k a j m i l ɡ a ʁ d l ɔ̃ b ɔ ʁ t ɑ̃ s d y s i s t ɛ m s ɔ s j a l e d ə l ɔ̃ t e ɡ ʁ a s j ɔ̃ k ɔ l ɛ k t i v
ø ʁ ɔ b d y s y d e m e ʁ i d j ɔ n a l
m ɔ j iː ʁ t m ɛ s y ʁ t ɔ d a v i d k ɔ l i v n
d y n b j ɛ ʁ d ø k ɔ

i l ɛ t i n y m e d ɑ̃ n œ̃ k ɔ v ɑ̃ d e m i n i m b ʁ ɛ d ə k a d i k s

ɛ l ɛ l ə s j ɛ v d y b ɔ w j a d ə w ɔ l k n

ɛ l s ə d e ʁ ɔ l a m y n e d y l ɔ v ʁ

b ɑ̃ s k ɔ m m w a
a s i b y t ʁ e t j e k œ̃ t e l e t y b i
n ɔ n ə s a v j ɔ̃ b a k ə t y e t ɛ n a ʁ i v e
ʁ a b i d m ɑ̃ l ə ɡ ʁ ɔ b s ə t ɛ k ɔ n ɛ t ʁ a m ɔ̃ ʁ e a l b ɔ ʁ s e b ʁ ɛ s t a s j ɔ̃ ʁ ə m a ʁ k e n e ɛ k s b l a n i v

j ɛ ʁ ɛ l b ɛ m ɛ
